detail_desc: Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a decorative back pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Top in soft, printed jersey with short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes and braided ties that can be wound around the ankles. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Biker jacket in soft, brushed fabric with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets and a decorative tab and fake button at the sides. Lined.
Short wrapover skirt in soft cotton twill. High waist with a concealed button and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings, and a flap side pocket. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with gathered elastication at the waist and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front with ties at one side. Unlined.
Imitation suede mules with crossover straps at the front. and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 1 cm, heel 7 cm.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dress with a bodice in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and flared skirt in glittery tulle. Press-stud on one shoulder and short raglan sleeves. Lined skirt.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood,  kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 2.4 cm.
Strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey with a V-neck with lace embroidery at the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with embroidery on the front, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle on the flap, an inner pocket and a metal chain shoulder strap. Size 4x15x17 cm.
Cap in hard-washed cotton with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and wide, super-flared legs.
Jacket in supersoft pile. Hood with appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a slightly longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in an organic cotton weave with elastication at the top, frilled shoulder straps and short legs with elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in sizes 0-9M.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fancy dress costume with a satin bodice and bows and gold-coloured trims at the top. Short sleeves trimmed with a bow, a seam at the waist and a lined, glittery skirt in several layers of tulle.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Ballet pumps in satin made from recycled polyester. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit. Fleece lining.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a wrapover front and high waist with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover and draping at the front and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that double and cross at the back. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and ties at one side.
Fisherman's hat in cotton twill with a small appliqué. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.

Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Wide pointed lapels, buttons down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets and an adjustable buttoned tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short dress in velour with long sleeves, a frill-trimmed cut-out section at the back and a button at the back of the neck. Gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.
5-pocket ankle-length twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Double-layered hat in jersey with a print motif on the front.
Knee-length satin dress with flounce details, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a zip in the side. Unlined.
V-neck jumper in a soft, stocking-stitched knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces down the front, a V-neck with ties at the neckline and long sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and laser-cut straps at the sides.
Velour leggings with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a large, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a V-shaped, mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a draped neckline and open back. Spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long sleeves, cuffs with a covered button, and a seam at the waist with a knot detail at one side and elastication at the back.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
Wide top in soft cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a stand-up collar. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, a yoke at the back and press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with hole pattern details and long raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Straight-cut, V-neck top in a soft weave with decorative pin-tucks at the top and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in grained imitation leather with a high waist and zip fly and button. Lined.
